Uses of Package
org.smartfrog.services.dns

Classes in org.smartfrog.services.dns used by org.smartfrog.services.dns
DNSBindingIP
          An interface that defines a DNS IP/hostName binding.
DNSComponent
          A sub-class of component description that adds specific dns behaviour for parameter checking, linking, and configuration output.
DNSComponentImpl
          An abstract class that implements the component description interface for dns components.
DNSData
          An interface for a DNS top level component.
DNSDeployerGui
          Triggers an interaction with the user to select a service instance.
DNSException
           
DNSManager
          A remote interface to interact with the DNS manager.
DNSModifier
          A remote interface representing an active modification to DNS.
DNSModifierException
          A smartfrog exception that represents a failed DNS config modification.
DNSNamed
          A remote interface to a "named" DNS server that allows to manage it.
DNSNamedImpl
          A "generic" named daemon wrapper that has little control over the life-cycle of the daemon, but can check status using a "standard" mechanism.
DNSOpaqueImpl
          Implements a "opaque" option that we don't know how to interpret but just passes to the DNS options directly.
DNSOptions
          An interface for gloabl DNS options.
DNSRecord
          An interface for a helper class that represents a DNS record that needs to be updated.
DNSServiceFilter
          An interface that a custom filter for service instances should implement.
DNSServiceInstance
          A "bean like" interface to a service instance.
DNSServiceQuery
          A query interface to a service class registered in DNS, for which we can find a set of instances currently registered.
DNSView
          An interface for a DNS view.
DNSZone
          An interface that defines a DNS Zone.
